title: Order Lines
content:

Order Lines

 

  • Order Lines
    • Filters
    • Action Buttons

The Order Lines UI is accessible directly from the menu as well as from the Orders UI through the Related Links button.  When accessed from the menu, the UI displays all order lines while providing the ability to filter and sort the data.  When accessed from the Orders UI, the Order Lines UI displays order lines that correspond to the selected order(s). 

 

Filters

The following list of filters is available on the screen:

  • Order Line Id
  • Order Id
  • Source Id
  • Source Type
    • ASN
    • On Hand
    • Overstock
    • Purchase Order (PO)
  • Item Id

Action Buttons

The following action buttons are available on the page:

 

Field

 

 Description

 
Select All Rows Selects all the rows of records on the screen.
Related Links

The user can select one or multiple order lines and navigate to orders using the Related Links.  The filter will be applied to the selected order lines, and only orders that are related to the selected order lines will be displayed. 
Export Exports the list of order line attributes, and the file will be downloaded onto your system. View Export for more information.
